meanings.definition: A circle of light or brightness surrounding something, especially the head or body of a person depicted as holy or sacred.
meanings.sent1: The painting showed a saint with aureolae glowing around his head.
meanings.sent2: The angel in the picture had aureolae shining brightly above her head.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they drew aureolae around their own heads with yellow crayons.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an aureolae that enveloped everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise cast an aureolae of golden light over the mountains, creating a breathtaking sight.

meanings.sent1: The ancient statue of the god had aureolae carved into the stone above its head.
meanings.sent2: The painting of the queen displayed an aureolae encircling her regal figure.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think it was royalty, walking around with an imaginary aureolae above its head.
meanings.sent4: The aura of confidence around her was like an aureolae that commanded attention.
meanings.sent5: The streetlight at night created an aureolae of light around it, illuminating the dark road.
